title: Herman Cain
deleted: Cain died from [[COVID-19]] on July 30, 2020, at the age of 74.<!-- Please join the discussion on the talk page ([[Talk:Herman Cain#Cain not masking in Tulsa]]) about whether to include Cain's attendance of the Tulsa Trump rally or his opinions on mask-wearing before adding or removing information about such to the lead. -->Cain's Twitter account has continued to engage in COVID denialism, even from beyond the grave.

title: Herman Cain
added: After four weeks of hospitalization, Cain died from COVID-19 complications on July 30, 2020, at the age of 74.<ref>{{Cite news |last=Edelman |first=Adam |date=July 30, 2020 |title=Former GOP presidential candidate Herman Cain dies of COVID-19 |url=https://www.nbcnews.com/politics/politics-news/former-gop-presidential-candidate-herman-cain-dead-coronavirus-n1235312 |access-date=August 9, 2020 |work=[[NBC News]] |language=en}}</ref>
